QuestData.Title: The Lost Dynasty
QuestData.Description: I wonder if I could bother you for another task. My daughter, the good Sentinel Commander Lyalia here, refuses to let me go into the field.$b$bI have spent everyday in that oubliette staring at the ruins to our north, itching to investigate.$b$bIf we are where I suspect we are those ruins could contain the key we need to finding the fabled Pools of Youth!$b$BPlease, $c! Go to those ruins and salvage any tablets that still have writing on them.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is one thing to research the lost dynasties. It is quite another to visit their ancient ruins.$b$bI am giddy as I have not felt in centuries!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh! Fabulous! Fabulous!$b$BYour one trip has advanced my research more than ten years of reading dusty tomes and decaying scrolls...$b$bAnd those "mogu" you saw. I have been doing some research as well as speaking to Kang on the subject.$b$bI suspect now that they were the race of the lost dynasties that my research is derived from.$b$bOf course, that also means that they are the ones who used to control the Pools of Youth.
